name: Match Maker
description:
Match Maker

Help Cupid spread the love! Use your trusty crossbow and biographical list to match the best couples based on their interests. Part strategy and part shooter, this game was made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls

Left Mouse: Shoot (while scoped), open/close map

Right Mouse: Toggle scope, close map

Programming and Art by Poishiche

Music and Sound by BoboNator
